Name: zho-anonymousgroupo-la
Author: Anonymous Group Of Translators
Source: Goodword Books , http://www.goodwordbooks.com/ , Center for Peace and Spirituality , https://www.cpsglobal.org/

Translations.Text: Wo ceng qishi mu sa (shuo):“Ni zai yejian shuailing wo de zhong pu er luxing, nimen que shi bei zhuigan de.”
Falao paiqian zhengmu zhe dao ge chengshi qu
Ta shuo:“Zhexie ren que shi yi xiao cuo ren
Tamen que shi jinule wo
women que shi jinshen de tuanti.”
Wo jiu shi tamen likai xuduo yuanpu he yuanquan
caibao he gaogui de zhusuo
(Shiqing) shi xiang nayang de. Wo shi yiselie de houyi jicheng ta
Diren zai ri chu shi gan shang tamen
Dang liang jun xiang wang de shihou, mu sa de tonghuomen shuo:“Women shi bi yao bei diren zhui shang.”
Ta shuo:“Jue bu hui de! Wo de zhu tong wo zai yiqi, ta jiang yindao wo.”
Wo qishi mu sa shuo:“Ni yingdang yong ni de shouzhang ji hai.” Hai jiu lie kai, mei yi bu fen, xiang yizuo dashan
Zai nali, wo shi bie de ren zou jin (tamen)
Wo zhengjiu mu sa he ta de quanti huoban
Ranhou, yan sile qiyu de ren
Ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang, dan tamen daban bushi xindao zhe
Ni de zhu que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de
Ni yingdang dui tamen xuandu yi bo la xin de gushi
Dangri, ta dui ta de fuqin he zongzu shuo:“Nimen chongbai shenme?”
Tamen shuo:“Women chongbai ouxiang, women yizhi shi qiancheng de.”
Ta shuo:“Nimen qidao de shihou, tamen neng tingjian nimen (de qidao ma)
Tamen neng jiang fu yu nimen huo jiang huo yu nimen ma?”
Tamen shuo:“Buran, women ceng faxian women de zuxian shi nayang zuo de.”
Ta shuo: “Nimen gaosu wo ba! Nimen suo chongbai de shi shenme
Nimen zui gu de zuxian chongbai de shi shenme
Tamen que shi wo de choudi, wei quan shijie de zhu ze buran
Ta shi chuangzao wo, ranhou yindao wo de
Ta shi gong wo shi, gong wo yin de
Wo haibing shi, shi ta shi wo quanyu de
Ta jiang shi wo si, ranhou shi wo fuhuo
Wo xiwang ta zai baoying ri she you wo de guoshi
Zhu a! Qiu ni ci wo zhihui, qiu ni shi wo jinru shanren de hanglie
Qiu ni wei wo zai hou ren zhong liu yige ling ming
Qiu ni shi wo wei ji leyuan de jicheng zhe
Qiu ni she you wo de fuqin, ta que shi mi wu de
Qiu ni buyao lingru wo, zai tamen bei fuhuo zhi ri
ji caichan he zisun dou wu biyi zhi ri.”
Wei daizhe yi ke chunjie de xin lai jian zhenzhu zhe,(de qi biyi)
Leyuan jiang bei dai dao jingwei zhe de fujin
Huo yu jiang bei chenlie zai xie'e zhe de mianqian
Yao xiang tamen shuo:“Nimen yiqian she zhenzhu er chongbai de, rujin zai nali ne
Tamen neng zhu nimen ne? Haishi tamen neng zizhu ne
Jiang bei touru huo yu zhong de, shi tamen he mi wu zhe
yiji yi bo lie si de yixie budui.”
Tamen zai huo yu zhong zhengbianzhe shuo
“zhi zhenzhu fashi, yiqian, women queshi zai mingxian de mi wu zhong
Dangri, women shi nimen yu quan shijie de zhu tong shou chongbai
Weiyou fanzui zhe shi women mi wu
Suoyi women jue meiyou shuo qing zhe
ye meiyou zhongshi de pengyou
Dan yuan women jiang fanhui chenshi, women jiangyao bian cheng xindao zhe.”
Ci zhong que you yige jixiang, dan tamen daban bushi xindao de
Ni de zhu que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de
Nu ha de zongzu ceng fouren shizhe
Dangshi, tamen de dixiong nu ha dui tamen shuo:“Nimen zenme bu jingwei zhenzhu ne
Wo duiyu nimen que shi yige zhongshi de shizhe
Gu nimen yingdang jingwei zhenzhu, yingdang fucong wo
Wo bu wei chuanda shiming er xiang nimen suoqu renhe baochou; wo de baochou, zhi you quan shijie de zhu fudan
Gu nimen yingdang jingwei zhenzhu, yingdang fucong wo.”§
